actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation

official_title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to provide for the exclusion from income, for purposes of determining eligibility and amount of benefits under the supplemental security income program, of income received by reason of employment in a sheltered work setting.

summary.text: Amends title XVI (Supplemental Security Income) of the Social Security Act to exclude from the income of an individual applying for such benefits specified income earned in a sheltered work setting.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to provide for the exclusion from income, for purposes of determining eligibility and amount of benefits under the supplemental security income program, of income received by reason of employment in a sheltered work setting.
